description: The Inquisitor is a fanatic man and thirsty for power. He rules his people in a brutal and merciless manner. Still many believers follow his call, empowering him with bigger armies than any other ruler!
taunt_1: Not for much longer and I will deliver your soul to God's merciful hands. You will burn at the stake!
taunt_2: My word IS the word of God! You cannot escape from my sentence!
taunt_3: Your blasphemous presence in these Holy Lands cannot be tolerated any longer! You will obtain your nemesis but soon!
taunt_4: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit - I consecrate you to DEATH!
anger_1: Aargh! How dare you!? Withstanding me is withstandig GOD!
anger_2: Go to the devil! You shall pay dearly for your offenses!
plead: The Holy Scripture refers to God's love and his interminable mercy - I bid you, spare me!
nervous_2: Do come! Waste your men's lives! I await you with steel and flames!
victory_1: Ha! Do you not see that you cannot win?
victory_2: The suffering of your people is YOUR responsibility! Give up and I will show mercy to you.
victory_3: You have denied the articles of faith of our Holy Mother Church. Now you will be delivered to me for just punishment!
victory_4: No admission of guilt will spare the heretics of these countries! I will not rest until even the last lost soul burns to death!
request: Even the means of the church are finite - you must send us the necessary goods!
thanks: I am very much obliged, my child.
ally_death: You do not enter the Garden of Eden by foot but by heart. My heart is pure, thus I leave this world without fear.
congrats: Well done, you have quashed another miscreant! Sincere thanks, in the name of God.
boast: I have been sent by church counsel to ensure purity of faith. I now declare the judgment of God over a further foe; you are my witness.
help: HELP! The forces of the enemy threaten to triumph! FOOL, help me, you need me!
extra: Hey you cheeky devil! Off to bed now!
siege: I cannot put up with our enemies' heresy any longer! I will assign them to death by fire and thus serve justice of God.
no_attack_1: I follow only the call of God - I cannot follow yours!
no_attack_2: Your bold plan would cost too many innocent souls their lives. I am not willing to pay such a price.
no_help_1: My warriors are already fulfilling divine acts in other places. I cannot spare any men!
no_help_2: I prayed for you. At present nothing remains for me to do.
no_sent: I have no capacity to govern the modest possessions of the church. I'm afraid you need to approach someone else.
sent: God is merciful; thus I follow His example - along with this message you receive the means you asked for.
team_winning: This war is just, for it serves a holy cause. Our enemies have nothing to set against the Lord's will.
team_losing: Your feebleness disgusts me - our endeavour is doomed to failure due to you!
help_sent: Fear not... ! My holy warriors are approaching fast to your rescue!
will_attack: It is the will of God and thus shall it happen!
